comment: Own calculations based on policy paper MEJ-CT[2012]. Rates set according to the following schedule: 1/3 of full tax rate in 2012 and 2013, 2/3 in 2014 and 2015, 3/3 in 2016. Scope is the same as petroleum and coal tax since it is a component of it.
